tasks.prompt: Inventory files, languages, and build tools for onboarding.
Enumerate external dependencies and runtime surfaces.
Map vendor and third-party boundaries.
Determine observability and diagnostics touchpoints.
Explain migration and compatibility pathways.
Produce component and module orientation context.
Provide architecture and ownership map.
Map feature-flag and behavior toggles.
Clarify failure domains and escalation points.
Map build-cache and generated artifact flow.
Identify repository entry points and key commands.
Track expertise concentration by module ownership.
Establish ownership and dependency boundaries.
Identify user-facing risks for integration changes.
Identify data quality and correctness risk points.
Produce domain model overview and core entities.
Identify code smells and refactor opportunities.
Identify security-critical data and access paths.
Determine rollback, failure, and recovery pathways.
Map analytics and instrumentation coverage.
